Component.name: FollowerComponent
Component.Description:
Smoothly follows a target entity using exponential decay interpolation. Creates natural, eased movement for companions, cameras, or UI elements.
Usage: companion.setComponent(FollowerComponent( targetName = "player", followDistance = 1.5f, followOffset = Vector3(0f, 1f, 0f) ))
System pattern: Query.where { has(FollowerComponent.id, Transform.id) } .filter { by(FollowerComponent.enabledData).isEqualTo(true) }
Attributes: - expDecay: Smoothing factor (higher = faster catch-up, default 8) - targetName: Name of target entity (matched via Named component) - enabled: Toggle following on/off - followOffset: Offset from target position - followDistance: Minimum distance to maintain from target

Component.name: FollowerTarget
Component.Description:
Marks an entity as a valid follow target. Paired with FollowerComponent to create leader-follower relationships.
Usage: player.setComponent(FollowerTarget(targetName = "player"))
Finding targets: Query.where { has(FollowerTarget.id, Named.id) } .filter { by(Named.nameData).isEqualTo(targetName) } .eval().firstOrNull()
Attributes: - targetName: Unique identifier for this target (must match FollowerComponent.targetName) - isBuiltInFollower: If true, uses built-in SDK follower behavior

Component.name: DroneComponent
Component.Description:
Flying drone behavior with smooth rotation and realistic tilt. Follows a target while banking into turns like a quadcopter.
Usage: drone.setComponent(DroneComponent( targetName = "player", rotationSpeed = 0.1f, tiltFactor = 0.3f ))
Animation integration: Combine with Animated component and blend tree for propeller spin, banking animations based on movement direction.
Attributes: - targetName: Name of entity to follow - enabled: Toggle drone behavior - rotationSpeed: How fast the drone turns (0.0-1.0) - tiltFactor: How much the drone tilts when turning (0 = none, 1 = aggressive)
